ComicInfo.Title: Yaddle's Tale: The One Below; What They Called Me; A Summer's Dream; Hoth; Lando's Commandos: On Eagle's Wings
ComicInfo.Summary:
Yaddle's Tale: The One Below: Yaddle is promoted to Jedi Master.
What They Called Me: A humorous tale starring the Ewoks.
A Summer's Dream: A love story set before Padme was elected Queen of Naboo.
Hoth: A humorous Star Wars tale starring a wampa.
Lando's Commandos: On Eagle's Wings: Lando Calrissian volunteers to lead a mission to discover who is attacking New Republic convoys and stealing their cargoes.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-13 06:08:38. [CVDB97448] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 08:47:49. [Issue ID 214990]
